com.mousebird.maply

Class CoordSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.CoordSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeoCoordSystem, PlateCarreeCoordSystem, SphericalMercatorCoordSystem

    public class CoordSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    The coord system is a very simple representation of the coordinate systems supported by WhirlyGlobe-Maply. Very few moving parts are accessible at this level. In general, you'll want to instantiate one of the subclasses and pass it around to Mapy objects as needed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Point3d ll
      Lower left corner of the bounding box in local coordinates.
      Point3d ur
      Upper right corner of the bounding box in local coordinates.

      • geographicToLocal

        public Point3d geographicToLocal(Point3d pt)
        Convert from WGS84 longitude/latitude coordinates to the local coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        pt - The input coordinate in longitude/latitude WGS84 radians. Yes, radians.
        Returns:
        A point in the local coordinate system.

      • localToGeographic

        public Point3d localToGeographic(Point3d pt)
        Convert from the local coordinate system to WGS84 longitude/latitude in radians.
        Parameters:
        pt - A point in the local coordinate system.
        Returns:
        A coordinate in longitude/latitude WGS84 radians. Yes, radians.
